sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-app-bar
        class="flex-grow-0"
        dark
        collapse-on-scroll
        fixed
    >
      <!-- BURGER MENU -->
      <v-menu v-if="!isExtends" left bottom>
        <template v-slot:activator="{ on }">
          <v-btn icon v-on="on">
            <v-app-bar-nav-icon> </v-app-bar-nav-icon>
          </v-btn>
        </template>

        <v-list>
          <v-list-item @click="goTo('/')">Home</v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-menu>

      <v-app-bar-title>{{ $t("navbar.title") }}</v-app-bar-title>
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>

      <v-btn icon>
        <v-icon>mdi-magnify</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
      <v-btn icon>
        <v-icon>mdi-heart</v-icon>
      </v-btn>

      <!-- EXTEND MENU -->
      <template v-slot:extension>
        <v-tabs align-with-title>
          <v-tab @click="goTo(item.path)"  v-for="(item,index) in $t('navbar.items')" :key="index">{{ item.name }}</v-tab>
        </v-tabs>
      </template>

    </v-app-bar>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'topToolbar',
  data:()=>({
    extends:true
  }),
  computed:{
    isExtends(){return this.extends}
  },
  methods: {
    goTo (path) {this.$router.replace(path)}
  }
}
</script>
